subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text: {{Han char|rn=175|rad=非|as=00|sn=8|four=11111|canj=LMSY,LMYYY|ids=⿰⿰三丨⿰丨三(G),⿰⿰⿱𠄟㇀丿⿰丨三(HTK),⿰⿻⿰𠄟丿㇀⿰丨三(J),⿰⿰三丿⿰丨三(V)}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: {{och-l|非|tr=*pɯj}} is the fusion of the negation particle {{och-l|不|not}} and the copula {{och-l|惟|to be}}, attested in [[oracle bone script|oracle bone inscriptions]].
